blogPost.excerpt: It's about time docs were easy to use, flexible, and actually smart. We designed Input to have the simplicity of writing in a doc, but combined with some of the most powerful features of project management, so remote teams can get more done.
blogPost.body: It's about time docs were easy to use, flexible, and actually smart. We designed Input to have the simplicity of writing in a doc, but combined with some of the most powerful features of project management, so remote teams can get more done.
blogPost.title: Input - Collaborative notes and docs for remote teams.
blogPost.author: Jeffrey Wong

localize.description: 是时候让文档变得易于使用、灵活并且实际上是智能的了。我们将输入设计为具有在文档中编写的简单性，但是结合了一些最强大的项目管理功能，因此远程团队可以完成更多工作。
localize.tagline: 远程团队的协作笔记和文档。

localize.description: 是時候讓文檔變得易於使用、靈活並且實際上是智能的了。我們將輸入設計爲具有在文檔中編寫的簡單性，但是結合了一些最強大的項目管理功能，因此遠程團隊可以完成更多工作。
localize.tagline: 遠程團隊的協作筆記和文檔。

next.excerpt: Struum takes the ClassPass model and applies it to streaming services. The team includes former Disney+ and Discovery exes.
next.title: Struum - Classpass for streaming

localize.description: Struum采用ClassPass模型，并将其应用于流媒体服务。该团队包括前迪士尼+和探索频道的前高管。
Struum採用ClassPass模型，並將其應用於流媒體服務。該團隊包括前迪士尼+和探索頻道的前高管。
